item.title: Bank Transfers Issue
item.content:encoded:
[Medium] - Transfer Issues Investigation

Summary: Robinhood is currently investigating reports of customers experiencing issues transferring money into the platform. They are working to resolve the issue as soon as possible.

Apr 25, 09:52 PDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Apr 25, 09:37 PDT
Investigating - We’re investigating reports that some customers are experiencing issues transferring money into Robinhood. We’re working to resolve this as soon as possible.

item.title: Crypto Trading Issue
item.content:encoded:
Mar 29, 16:59 PDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Mar 29, 16:45 PDT
Investigating - We are experiencing issues with crypto trading. We are working to resolve this as soon as possible.

item.title: Phone Support Issue
item.content:encoded:
Mar 17, 08:46 PDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Mar 17, 07:37 PDT
Investigating - We’re investigating reports that some customers are unable to request phone support. We’re working to resolve the issue as soon as possible. Please be aware that the option to email customer support is still available from the app.

item.title: Market Data
item.content:encoded:
Mar 4, 08:55 PST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Mar 4, 07:32 PST
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Mar 4, 07:16 PST
Investigating - We’re experiencing an issue that’s impacting options market data. We’re working to resolve this issue as soon as possible.

item.title: Service Disruption
item.content:encoded:
Dec 7, 14:53 PST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Dec 7, 09:46 PST
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Dec 7, 08:50 PST
Investigating - We’re investigating reports that some customers are experiencing issues transferring money in and out of Robinhood. We’re working to resolve this as soon as possible.

We’re investigating reports that customers are having trouble linking their bank accounts. We’re working to resolve this as soon as possible.

item.title: Trading Degraded
item.content:encoded:
Dec 1, 18:53 PST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Dec 1, 16:22 PST
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Dec 1, 15:44 PST
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Dec 1, 15:04 PST
Investigating - We’re investigating an issue that’s affecting crypto trading and working to resolve it as soon as possible.

item.title: 2021.11.19 Scheduled Maintenance
item.content:encoded:
Nov 19, 23:15 PST
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Nov 19, 23:00 PST
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Nov 19, 15:12 PST
Scheduled - We're upgrading our systems, so some features might not be available right now. This should only last a few minutes.

item.title: Login Issues
item.content:encoded:
Nov 11, 09:47 PST
Resolved - We fixed the issue that was affecting some customers’ ability to log in to their accounts. Customers should now be able to log in without trouble.

Nov 11, 08:08 PST
Investigating - We’re investigating reports that customers are having trouble logging in to their accounts. We’re working to resolve this issue as soon as possible.

item.title: Website Issue
item.content:encoded:
Nov 9, 10:38 PST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Nov 9, 08:25 PST
Investigating - We are currently experiencing issues with our logged-out website. Logged-in customers can still use our web platform as usual. Please visit robinhood.com/login if you are attempting to sign up or log in to your account on Web.

item.title: Bank Transfer Issues
item.content:encoded:
Nov 9, 07:45 PST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Nov 9, 07:06 PST
Investigating - We’re investigating reports that some customers are experiencing issues transferring money in and out of Robinhood. We’re working to resolve this as soon as possible.

item.content:encoded:
Sep 14, 16:21 PDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Sep 14, 16:13 PDT
Investigating - We’re experiencing issues affecting some crypto orders and some customers’ ability to use our web app. We’re working to resolve these issues as soon as possible.

item.title: Options market data display
item.content:encoded:
Sep 2, 12:41 PDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Sep 2, 08:09 PDT
Identified - We’re experiencing a display issue that’s affecting options market data for some symbols that begin with the letters W, Y, X, and Z. We are working to resolve this issue as soon as possible.

Sep 2, 07:36 PDT
Investigating - We’re experiencing a display issue that’s affecting options market data and are working to resolve this issue as soon as possible.

Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Investigating - We’re experiencing an issue affecting new account application submissions and profile updates in the app. We’re working to resolve this as soon as possible.

item.content:encoded:

Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jun 8, 07:52 PDT
Investigating - We’re investigating reports that some customers are encountering an error when trying to close an options position.

item.title: Crypto Upgrade
item.content:encoded:
May 12, 23:15 PDT
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

May 12, 23:00 PDT
Update - Robinhood Crypto is undergoing a planned systems upgrade, and trading is temporarily unavailable as a result. The total downtime is not expected to be longer than 1 hour. We’ll let you know as soon as everything is back up and running.

May 12, 23:00 PDT
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

May 12, 21:55 PDT
Scheduled - Robinhood Crypto is undergoing a planned systems upgrade, and trading is temporarily unavailable as a result. The total downtime is not expected to be longer than 1 hour. We’ll let you know as soon as everything is back up and running.

Apr 27, 21:43 PDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Update - Customers may be seeing crypto orders display as "pending" for an extended period of time. We were experiencing a delay in order status updates and will provide an update here when the issue is resolved.

Investigating - We are experiencing issues with crypto trading. We are working to resolve this as soon as possible.

item.title: Crypto Trading Issue
item.content:encoded:
Apr 16, 09:27 PDT
Resolved - Crypto trading is back online. We’ve resolved the issue that was affecting it.

Apr 16, 08:23 PDT
Update - We’re experiencing intermittent issues with crypto trading due to heightened volumes. Because of this, some crypto trades may not execute right now.

Apr 16, 08:14 PDT
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

Apr 16, 07:56 PDT
Identified - We’re experiencing intermittent issues with crypto trading due to heightened volumes. Because of this, some crypto trades may not execute right now.

Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Apr 16, 07:22 PDT
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Apr 16, 07:19 PDT
Investigating - We’re currently experiencing issues with crypto trading due to unprecedented volumes and are working to resolve them as soon as possible.
